oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Addons Plugin Updates
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox automatically updates installed add-ons and plugins.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Automatic Downloads of MIME Types
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox automatically executes or downloads MIME types which are not authorized for auto-download.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Auto download actions of mime type is disabled

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Auto-Update Capability
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox should not be able to automatically update itself.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Autofill Form Assistance
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox formfill assistance option is disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable User Ability To Autofill Passwords
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox should not be configured to autofill passwords.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Background Information Submission
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: There should be no background submission of technical and other information to Mozilla with portions posted publically.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Development Tools
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox development tools are disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Default Firefox Home Page Configured
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The default homepage for Firefox is set and cannot be changed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Extension Installation
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox extensions install is disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript Context Menus
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox should be configured to not allow JavaScript to disable or replace context menus.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript's Ability To Change The Status Bar
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox should be configured to not allow JavaScript to hide or change the status bar.

oval-def:criterion.comment: disable hiding or changing status bar menus

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript's Ability To Modify The Browser Appearance
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox should be configured not to allow JavaScript to change the status bar text.

oval-def:criterion.comment: disable changing the status bar text

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript's Raise Or Lower Windows Capability
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox should be configured to not allow JavaScript to raise or lower windows.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable JavaScript's Moving Or Resizing Windows Capability
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: FireFox should not be configured to allow JavaScript to move or resize windows.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Non-Secure Page Warnings
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox is not configured to provide warnings when a user switches from a secure (SSL-enabled) to a non-secure page.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Downloading and Opening File Confirmation
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox is not configured to prompt user before downloading and opening required file types.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable the Firefox Password Store
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The Firefox password store should be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Firefox Pop-up Blocker
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The Firefox Pop-up blocker should be enabled as windows may be used to launch an attack within a new browser window with altered settings.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Installed Search Plugins Update Checking
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Search plugins can be automatically configured to check for updates. Updates need to be controlled and installed from authorized and trusted servers.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable Firefox Access to Shell Protocols
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Firefox can be configured to access systems shells which could potentially allow Firefox and other users to access to the underlying system.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable TLS Usage in Firefox
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Use of versions prior to TLS 1.1 are not permitted. SSL 2.0 and SSL 3.0 contain a number of security flaws. These versions must be disabled in compliance with the Network Infrastructure and Secure Remote Computing STIGs.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable SSL Version 2.0 in Firefox
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: SSL 2.0 and SSL 3.0 contain a number of security flaws. Therefore, SSL 2.0 should be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable SSL Version 3 in Firefox
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Earlier versions of SSL have known security vulnerabilities and are not authorized for use in DOD.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Enable Certificate Verification
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: When a web site asks for a certificate for user authentication, Firefox must be configured to have the user choose which certificate to present. Websites within DOD require user authentication for access which increases security for DoD information. Access will be denied to the user if certificate management is not configured

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Supported Version of Firefox Installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Use of versions of an application which are not supported by the vendor are not permitted. Vendors respond to security flaws with updates and patches. These updates are not available for unsupported versions which can leave the application vulnerable to attack.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Clear Cookies And Other Data When Firefox Closes
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Set browser preferences to perform a Clear Private Data operation when closing the browser in order to clear cookies and other data installed by websites visited during the session.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable User Prompt For Clearing Cookies And Other Data
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Users should not be prompted about data and cookies being cleared when the browser is closed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Prevent Users from Changing Firefox Configuration Settings
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Locked settings prevents users from accessing about:config and changing the security settings set by the system administrator.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Prevent Users from Changing Firefox Configuration Settings
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Locked settings prevents users from accessing about:config and changing the security settings set by the system administrator.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Do not obscure locked file content with ROT-13

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Mozilla Firefox
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The application installed on the system is firefox.

oval-def:extend_definition.comment: Installed OS is part of the Unix family

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Installed operating system is part of the Unix family
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The operating system installed on the system is part of the Unix OS family

oval-def:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Check for Auto download Actions installed
Check that auto-update of firefox is disabled
Check for disable javaScript context menu is disabled
Check that hiding or changing status bar is disabled
Check that changing the status bar text is disabled
raise or lower windows is disabled
Check for move or resize windows disabled
Check for non-secure page warning configured
Check that the password_store is disabled
Check search plugin update capability is disabled
Check that the hell_protocol is disabled
Check if minimum TLS version is 2
Check if maximum TLS version is 4

linux:rpminfo_test.comment: Installed version of firefox is greater than 68.4.0

ind:family_test.comment: Test installed OS is part of the unix family
